Articles.Content:
Hi this is the first challenge I have posted on this forum so if I have made a mistake please tell me. Now to the challenge, the challenge is to land a non VTOL vehicle on top of one of the KSC buildings. You will get points awarded based on which building you land on:

10, points for landing on the SPH

15, points for landing on the VAB

20, points for landing of the Mission control building and astronaut complex.

25, points for landing on the bridge along its length

35, points for landing of the bridge along its width

50, points for landing on the Control or water tower.

You are allowed to use any engines so long as you are not using VTOL engines.

You are allowed to use any mod parts as long as they are not overpowered, I would recommend using firespitter parts as the propellers have a reverse thrust option. Also parachutes are not allowed.

IF people want to use FAR I will provide a separate leaderboard.

This is my entry. which means I get 15 points.

You must post a picture or video for verification.

Also I will award 10 points for a unique and cleaver design.

Edited June 14, 2014 by mrmcp1
You may want to consider not allowing the use of parachutes?
Control tower does not count as a very long runway.
Just saw it- The best coming soon!
